excerpt.en: Welcome to the Tietokilta website, great that you found your way here! Tietokilta is an association of computer science students at Aalto University, and we organise all kinds of activities for our members, as well as looking after their interests. For more information relevant to new students, please see the link below. See you at Orientation Week!

excerpt.en: The hottest tips of the day can be found from histo.tik, from the page "alkutaival". Calculate how many times the word "tieto" can be found from the page. "Tieto" can be included in the word, or be as it's own word. You can find the  histo.tik by browsing the guild's website.

excerpt.en: Hi guild member! Do you wish to organize events for the guild, or write articles to the guild's magazine Alkorytmi? Maybe you are interested in striking deals with companies or taking fellow guild members to try some new sport? Now is the chance to fulfill your dreams, as the guild is recruiting for new committee members!
